short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that changes the hexagonal twitter shape for the rounded ones.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"No NFT Twitter Shapes" hides the NFT feature that Twitter recently added.

Twitter developed a NFT compatibility by adding a new type of profile picture that let's people know that your current image is an NFT by changing the rounded shape by a hexagonal one.

This extension aims to hide this new type of images to get rid of this crypto-trend on the platform. So with that extension enabled you only will see rounded shapes.

This extension is currently in development, so if you experience any issues let me know.
